title: Roach
description: After failing to honor his dead mother, Griffin Scoarse searches for his purpose within the now empty New York City. Fearful of responsibility and failure, Alex Nessler voluntarily puts herself under the command and authority of others. Revisiting old memories and coming face to face with the war effort, Griffin and Alex must choose between personal sacrifice and selfish survival. Filled with violence, war, fear, and at times, inspiration and hope- Roach brings together the ultimate character contradiction. Embodying a parabola of accelerating potential, only to leave you with just one inevitable ending.
author: Alisa Perederey
